website_summaries.verdict: These clippers undercut the cost of competitors, and a fingernail clipper is included.
pros: Made from surgical stainless steel, these clippers have a good grip and are easy to control
Even at their cheaper price, these are well made and sharp enough for the thickest nails
cons: The squared edges of the handles may be uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: quality and muscular
customer_reviews.text: A nail clipper is not enough for those pesky toe nails. This muscular toe nail clipper, made of stainless steel, is razor sharp and made to surgical quality standards. It comes in a small sturdy cardboard box for storage. Delivery was fast and reliable and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: JEDrury

customer_reviews.title: Professional grade
customer_reviews.text: These toenail clippers are easy to handle, have very sharp points with scalpel-like cutting edges. My old clipper's (unknown brand) spring mechanism wore out so I was pleased to find this as the replacement. The time it takes to trim some of my thickened nails is much less than with my old clippers due to the razor sharp edges and precision cut points. These should last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tool
customer_reviews.text: I get the job of cutting my mother's toenails, Funny things happen to elderly people's nails. Hers are extremely thick in places.(about 1/4 inch) and regular clippers won't hack it. These clippers work extremely well and I recommend. Just be really careful as these are serious cutting tools and could cause nasty wounds.
customer_reviews.author: Steve N. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Incompletely finished but nice otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, now that I finished sharpening the cutters. I noticed that my nail was catching as I tried to slide my it across one cutter and between the two. My nail was catching on burr created by sharpening. I ground the burrs off both edges using a diamond hone. The manufacturer should have addressed this.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rawson

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, strong clippers
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these sharp, strong clippers. The spring is functional, the finish is excellent, and it appears to be all stainless steel. It cuts thick toenails accurately, and like butter. If it holds up well, it will be perfect. If it does not, I will revise this review.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce R. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Successful trimming of thick nail on first try
customer_reviews.text: Steps followed: 1) Soak foot for 5-10 minutes in water as hot as you can stand. Dry thoroughly. 2) Use the RANIACO trimmer to slice the upper flat nail surface and repeat until nail thickness is less than 1/4 inch. 3)Trim the end of the nail with the R-trimmer taking as small bites as possible. Japanese trimmers with similar design are sturdier, but cost 10 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: gordon templeton

customer_reviews.title: Good toe nail cutter
customer_reviews.text: It is a good cutter and it is well made. I find it a little bit difficult to cut my own toe nails because it is difficult to hold it. Don't get me wrong I can cut my nails with it.
customer_reviews.author: abejo

customer_reviews.title: Sharp nail clippers
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in the mail today. They came in a beautiful box upon opening they were displayed on a black tray with safety cover on the end of the very sharp blades. These work great very sturdy in the hands makes it easy to grip.
customer_reviews.author: KarleighMegan

customer_reviews.title: Another Very Happy Customer.😃
customer_reviews.text: The Clippers are fabulous - I had unfortunately let my toe nails get a little nasty- but those little clippers took care of business - without too much trouble at all. I was delighted- everybody should have a pair - The price was Overwhelming for the excellent product received . Thank You Raniaco and Amazon. RagsfromRo 😋
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Ballinger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, well-made product for trimming toenails. Much easier to use than clippers.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Moss

customer_reviews.title: So much easier than regular toenail clippers
customer_reviews.text: My podiatrist recommended this type of cutter for my thick toenails and I wondered why I struggled with ordinary clippers for so long. Easy on my 70 year old hands and the blade makes a clean straight cut.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: they work perfectly. I can clip side of toe ...
customer_reviews.text: they work perfectly. I can clip side of toe mails ,cant use the regular toe nail clippers to do this, my to nails are tough, regular toe nail clippers slip out of hands. I will use these clippers on other things beside toenails.
customer_reviews.author: wildbill

customer_reviews.title: Good clipers but check locally
customer_reviews.text: Worked great but I would recommend checking locally. The price here was much more than I found locally a few days after I purchased. They do the trick but are pretty expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Well built pair of clippers with a good angle on the nippers
customer_reviews.text: Well built pair of clippers with a good angle on the nippers. Have not tried but I think I could even sharpen them when they start to get dull.
customer_reviews.author: BuSB

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These work as promised my husband has used some unusual tools to clip his toenails those are no longer needed these work great on extra thick tonails!
customer_reviews.author: R. Reimler

customer_reviews.title: Buy these clippers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these clippers for my boyfriend. I got mad at him and decided to keep them for myself, even if I had a pair already. I am so glad I did! I love these clippers! They fit my hand perfectly, they are very sharp and can really cut through a thick nail. You will not be sorry for your purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: catmitch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very sharp. Can cut through very thick nail, even those with toenail fungus. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JDB

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: These work great. They have no problem going through tough, thick nails. I was worried when other products didn't work so well but these are heavy duty and do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Rae P.

customer_reviews.title: healing from fungus toenails or simply heavy nails these are great..
customer_reviews.text: When working with damaged, healing from fungus toenails or simply heavy nails these are great.......
customer_reviews.author: Homer Dorton

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I had an ingrown toenail that ended up having to be surgically removed because I had let it go too long without cutting it. I couldn't find a clipper able to cut through the thick nail. The toenail has grown back ingrown again. This time I searched for a proper clipper to head off another surgical removal. This clipper cut through the thickness and so far...mission accomplished!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easily cut through thick toenails
customer_reviews.text: Amazon was late with delivery...having said that, company contacted me to gauge satisfaction with clippers...they are everything billed to be...easily cut through thick toenails, which, due to toenail fungus, were more like dog claws than toenails...
customer_reviews.author: matt hangas

customer_reviews.title: I'm really impressed
customer_reviews.text: These are better than your average toenail clippers. They are quite sharp - yes that means you need to be careful not to cut yourself, but just as with a kitchen knife, it takes less effort to make the cut and so in the long run they are safer to use.
customer_reviews.author: dr. lowbrow

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding clipper
customer_reviews.text: Truly well made, precise, sharp, high quality/luxury clipper. Will last a lifetime with proper care
customer_reviews.author: Seattle DD

customer_reviews.title: and are easy to grip
customer_reviews.text: The clippers seem to work very well, and are easy to grip. I like their feel, but be careful-as advertised, they are very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Smith

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and well made
customer_reviews.text: Much more substantial than similar clippers that we have bought at the local drugstore. Was pleasantly surprised to see that the clipper area has a concave curve to it to fit your nails. Appears to be quality construction that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hamel

customer_reviews.title: Thick nails? Buy these clippers
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Very bad toe nail fungus and the clippers cut the nail without any problems. Opens very wide and very sharp blade

customer_reviews.title: Have to be very careful with these -- not your ...
customer_reviews.text: Have to be very careful with these -- not your ordinary toenail clippers. Blade is VERY sharp and the tip is curved inward.

customer_reviews.title: Good clippers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my travel bag. Nice and sharp, but not too big. Plastic cap protects the tip in travel bag. Perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: I punctured my big toe the first time I used it because the tip was very sharp. After that mishap, it worked very well.

customer_reviews.title: Raniaco Toenail Clippers
customer_reviews.text: Raniaco Toenail Clippers are a well made top quality tool. Work great on a nasty job.

customer_reviews.title: Great toenail clippers
customer_reviews.text: These toenail clippers have a nicely curved and very pointed cutting edge. They are very sharp and cut with ease for me. A great replacement for my old broken clippers.

customer_reviews.title: So far the clippers seem good. However
customer_reviews.text: So far the clippers seem good. However, when I requested from Amazon "German Steel clippers", I was surprised to see that your clippers from Raniaco were in fact Chinese make? Thanks Michael

customer_reviews.title: These are the best for toenail problems
customer_reviews.text: These are really good clippers. They are sharp and can trim the thickest toenails, yet delicate enough to get down inside the corners of the nail to clip any part of the toenail that is causing problems. Great and fast shipping from Amazon. Thanks to both.

customer_reviews.title: Raniaco Toenail Clippers.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased that I purchased Raniaco Toenail Clippers. It cut my thick toenails very nicely. It is also very easy to use. I also like the case. I recommend this product for anyone with thick toenails.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love how well this works. It's super safe and even comes with a small lid to place over the clippers when not in use. The blades are sharp enough to cut the thick toenail in one spot without splitting it in another. Definitely with the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Wideman

customer_reviews.title: Great Clipper!
customer_reviews.text: I have one thick toe nail that has required a trip to the doc. to have cut. Now with this new clipper I can easily do it myself. They are sharp and the handle is long enough to provide the necessary leverage.

customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased three heavy duty nail clippers in my lifetime. This pair is the sharpest and easiest to use pair of all. I have only used them once but see the difference already. Nice product at a fair price. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp!

customer_reviews.title: Great clippers!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just used the Raniaco Toenail Clipper and was very pleased. Now I can clip my toenails myself and do not have to go to the podiatrist. Previously I was using a regular very large clipper from the drug store. I can tell you that it didn't work. These clippers did a great job. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: HB70

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these toenail clippers for my 80 year old mother's toenails. She neglected to tell anyone her nails needed cutting and they were incredibly long, curved, curled under and downright creepy looking. I didn't personally cut her nails, but my daughter did and these clippers did the job in a snap. They are durable, open wide for thick nails like my mother had and they didn't hurt her at all. We are very pleased and will use these clippers from now on the clip her nails and keep her happy. Her feet toes no longer look like she has talons! Thank you for a great product and quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made product - Save your money
customer_reviews.text: The third time I used this clipper the handle snapped off. See the photo. Hardly any pressure was applied, so clearly this is a cheaply made product if the "surgical stainless steel" cracked so easily. Save your money.

product_meta.title: beaueli Instant Teeth Whitening Pen
product_meta.description: Essentials Instant Teeth Whitening Pen Ultra Fine Bristles Easy Reach Design Extra Soft Applicator Brush Our professional strength whitening brush-on pen contains the same active ingredient used professionally by detists to brighten and whiten teeth. The active oxygen bubbles instantly starts working to gently remove stains. Directions 1. For best results, brush with your regular toothbrush and toothpaste. 2. Remove cover and twist clockwise (initially requires multiple turns) until gel appears. 3. Paint gel onto entire front surface of each upper tooth you wash to whiten and let dry. 4. Repeat for bottom teeth using a fresh bead of gel. 5. Wipe off excess gel from gums and lips. 6. Avoid eating or drinking for 30 minutes afterwards. Actual results may vary. Pre-brush and use gel twice daily for two weeks. After the second week, continue to use gel pen as needed to maintain your new whiter shade. Warnings Keep out of reach of children. Not for children under the age of 12. If more than amount used for whitening is accidentally swallowed, get medical help or call a Poison Control Center. If product contacts the eyes, rinse thoroughly with water. Do not use while sleeping. Avoid gel contact with all areas other than your teeth. If irritation of the gums or mouth occurs, discontinue use. Not recommended for use with braces. Will not whiten caps, crowns, or veneers. Ingredients Purified water, Alcohol denatured, PEG-8, PVP, Hydrogen peroxide
feature_bullets: SAFE ON SENSITIVE TEETH - Our active formula will white your teeth effectively. Contains the same active ingredient used professionally by dentists to brighten teeth and is quick acting, quick drying and easy to apply anytime. The active oxygen bubbles instantly start working to gently remove stains.
EASY TO USE - Essentials Instant Teeth Whitening Pen is so convenient and easy to use of instant teeth whitening pen.Just smile and brush on some gel.
HOW TO USE - Paint thin layer onto front surfaces of upper teeth and let dry. Repeat for bottom teeth using a fresh bead of gel.Wipe excess gel from gums and lips.
FOR YOUR BEST RESULT - First brush with your regular toothpaste. Please avoid eating or drinking for 30 minutes afterwards.
